intent: In the first category opened by the person in the video, there is a item on the page that has a grey background. Add the item with the grey background in its image to wishlist.
intermediate_intent: What was the name of the item with the grey background in the video?

instantiation_dict.condition: In the first category opened by the person in the video, there is a item on the page that has a grey background
instantiation_dict.description: the item with the grey background in its image

must_include: Pomegranate Seltzer by Polar Beverages 1 liter (33.8 fl oz) Bottles (4 Bottles)
Pomegranate Seltzer by Polar Beverages 1 liter (33.8 fl oz) Bottles (4 Bottles)
